name: nw_interface_t
desc: An interface that a network connection uses to send and receive data.

items.name: struct nw_interface_type_t
items.desc: Types of network interfaces, based on their link layer media types.

items.name: func nw_interface_get_type(nw_interface_t) -> nw_interface_type_t
items.desc: Accesses the type of the interface, such as Wi-Fi or Loopback.

items.name: func nw_interface_get_name(nw_interface_t) -> UnsafePointer<CChar>
items.desc: Accesses the name of the interface.

items.name: func nw_interface_get_index(nw_interface_t) -> UInt32
items.desc: Accesses the system interface index associated with the interface.
